////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
E code: 
% Script to solve and plot the ODEs for Project 1, Task Set E

% --- 1. Define General Parameters ---
ti = 0;      % Initial time (hours)
tf = 24;     % Final time (hours)
npts = 240;  % Number of points (for a step size of 0.1)
Td = 77;     % Desired thermostat temperature (°F)

% --- 2. Solve for each of the four cases ---

% Case (a): T(0) = 65, kd = 0.2
T0_a = 65;
kd_a = 0.2;
f_a = @(t, T) kd_a * (Td - T); % Function handle for the ODE
[t, T_a] = rk4(ti, tf, npts, T0_a, f_a);

% Case (b): T(0) = 65, kd = 2.0
T0_b = 65;
kd_b = 2.0;
f_b = @(t, T) kd_b * (Td - T); % Function handle for the ODE
[~, T_b] = rk4(ti, tf, npts, T0_b, f_b); % ~ ignores the 't' output since it's the same

% Case (c): T(0) = 95, kd = 0.2
T0_c = 95;
kd_c = 0.2;
f_c = @(t, T) kd_c * (Td - T); % Function handle for the ODE
[~, T_c] = rk4(ti, tf, npts, T0_c, f_c);

% Case (d): T(0) = 95, kd = 2.0
T0_d = 95;
kd_d = 2.0;
f_d = @(t, T) kd_d * (Td - T); % Function handle for the ODE
[~, T_d] = rk4(ti, tf, npts, T0_d, f_d);

% --- 3. Plot the Results ---
figure; % Creates a new figure window
hold on; % Allows multiple plots on the same graph

plot(t, T_a, 'b-', 'LineWidth', 2); % Blue solid line
plot(t, T_b, 'r-', 'LineWidth', 2); % Red solid line
plot(t, T_c, 'b--', 'LineWidth', 2); % Blue dashed line
plot(t, T_d, 'r--', 'LineWidth', 2); % Red dashed line

% Add labels, title, and legend as required by the project
title('Task Set E: Building Temperature vs. Time');
xlabel('Time (hours)');
ylabel('Temperature (°F)');
legend('T(0)=65, \kappa_d=0.2', ...
       'T(0)=65, \kappa_d=2.0', ...
       'T(0)=95, \kappa_d=0.2', ...
       'T(0)=95, \kappa_d=2.0', ...
       'Location', 'best');
grid on; % Adds a grid for easier reading
hold off; % Releases the figure
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
